# inputs

**Instance Property**

The inputs that provide media data to a capture session.

## Declaration

```swift
var inputs: [AVCaptureInput] { get }
```

## Discussion

You add new inputs to a capture session by callings its [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureSession/addInput(_:)] method.

## Configuring inputs

- **canAddInput(_:)**: Determines whether you can add an input to a session.
- **addInput(_:)**: Adds a capture input to the session.
- **removeInput(_:)**: Removes an input from the session.
